entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd Timed Out #97735
  • ToString() function in HttpQSCollection inside of System.Web.HttpUtility does not URL encode names #97732
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Interlocked tests fail #97730
  • [NativeAOT] linux-arm bring up #97729
  • System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl 5.0.0 DLL for net461 targets .NET Framework 4.7 #97728
  • Massive performance downgrade when using latest .NET 8 linux runtime image caused by libssl3 #97727
  • IPv6 uri with leading zeros makes it IPv4 look like #97719
  • Provide subsets for AltJits for RISC-V and LoongArch64 #97712
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel client-user and pipeline types #97711
  • [API Proposal]: Add RuntimeHelpers.GetUserDefinedOperatorMethods for trimming-safe access to user-defined operators #97709
  • [NativeAOT] Publish NativeAOT Project With Configure Manager Can't Got Result #97707
  • `[LibraryImport]` throws `NotImplementedException` on `ref readonly` parameters #97706
    9.0.0
  • [mono] remove runtime support for cominterop #97703
    9.0.0
  • "Undefined symbols: _main" when trying to build static library for iOS using "library mode" #97700
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 13 Regressions on 1/25/2024 1:30:33 AM #97714
  • The SocketsHttpHandler cannot authenticate NTLM with the username format domain\samAccountName #97691
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Enumerable.Range method #97689
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'hwintrinsicChild->isContained()' in 'System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives+ScaleBOperator #97688
  • Support adding links to Activity after it is created #97680
    Future

Closed

  • Unified Build behavior control update for emsdk #96909
  • Unified Build control update for cecil #96908
  • JIT: checked/release diffs #97638
    9.0.0
  • Implement Tensor Broadcasting #28377
    Future
  • Investigate performance of TensorArithmetic abstraction #28379
    Future
  • Sparse tensors should have a sparse-ness abstraction #28380
    Future
  • Add documentation markdown in the Tensor folder #28388
    Future
  • Meaning of negative index in System.Numerics.Tensors #35075
    Future
  • Logging source generator fails to compile if class has [DynamicallyAccessedMembers] #97498
    9.0.0
  • Scalability of System.Text.Json #97649
  • Support passing float[] (Single[]) to JS from .NET via [JSImport] #97633
  • Jump into Try/Catch Region #97693
  • Unnecessary buffer allocations when writing base64 values with `Utf8JsonWriter`. #97628
    Future
  • WASM UseAppHost=false but still host when I run #96955
  • [browser][MT] CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource #94486
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT codegen optimization opportunities #64242
    Future
  • [AssemblyLoadContext]: Restriction dlls for new Plugins #96207
  • [.NET6 fix port] AccessViolationException with PublishSingleFile #81181
  • Host tests should move out of the build and use the libraries test infrastructure #94271
  • GetRuntimeDirectory for WindowsDesktop apps #91182
  • OrderByDescending(...).First() changed which item is getting returned #97668
  • core 3.0 preview 6 broke out-of-process COM activation of non-embedded types in VB6 control #13066
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • STJ: Skip usage of indexer for KeyedCollection #97734
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Handle open types to appear in interface maps #97733
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • STJ: Avoid duplicate initialization of required or init-only properties #97726
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Source built short stack support #97725
    source-build, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: remove fallthrough limitations from redundant branch optimizer #97722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in mono_gsharedvt_constrai… #97721
    NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for ref-readonly in the .NET interop source generators #97720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97717
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.3
  • Take into account the local involved in GT_SWITCH for resolution #97713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Emit correct unwind codes for VPOP #97710
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Save trimmed methods list to a file #97705
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts #97702
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts #97701
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add API call for Arm64 Sve.LoadVectorNonFaulting #97695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update ClaimsPrincipal.cs #97690
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add APIs for allocation-free delegate invocation list inspection #97683
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Improve BBJ_COND to BBJ_ALWAYS conversion in fgUpdateFlowGraph #97681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0-preview1] [workloads][ios] Remove packages we no longer ship from net8 targets #97716
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview1] Revert "Update HP libunwind to v1.8.0" #97679
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Pow, Exp2, Exp10, Cbrt, RootN, Hypot, Log(x,y), Log10 #97623
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix S.T.Json's ArrayPool threshold #97704
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Remove optLoopCompactionFixupFallThrough #97670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Perform SKI encode and decode using managed implementation #97708
    area-System.Security
  • [workloads][ios] Remove packages we no longer ship from net8 targets #97715
    area-Build-mono
  • For Debug, make sure we use right register selection heuristics to match with Release #97657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97613
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • adjust ownership of infrastructure-mono #97655
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Fix some cases using `BasicBlock::bbFallsThrough` #97699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_DA_4A to IF_SVE_DC_3A group #97645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT] ARM: Implement the EABI #97604
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove installer/tests/Assets/TestUtils/SDKLookup #97583
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Add InvokeSpanIntoSpan helper for TensorPrimitives.SinCos{Pi} #97682
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Use DivRem in Decimal.DecCalc #97619
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • libraries/tests: skip System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests when DotNetBuildFromSource. #97697
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Remove buffer copy when writing base64 JSON value #97687
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Put scalar stack args with sign extension #97662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Avoid linking a bblock ending with a NOT_REACHABLE with … #97660
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Delete most of InteropExtensions #97685
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete Windows ARM32 support #97686
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete gcdump.cpp and related headers #97684
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: don't ask for all write barrer helpers for AOT #97677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Enable `DerivedCancellationTokenSource`, `AbandonExisting` #97545
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix stability of OrderByDescending.Last #97672
    area-System.Linq
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives shift and rotate operators #97361
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Add the barebones support for using embedded masking with AVX512 #97675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark all base types and interfaces as RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Return all error messages instead of throwing on the first error in linker tests #97605
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Unrestored/UnrestoredTypeKey flags #97674
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97650
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.3
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • mark-ro-instrumentation #97482
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Fix support for files with non-ascii characters on windows #92279
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default loop peeling phase #97517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [browser] improve behavior after exit, better docs #97651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser][mt] Unify multithreading switches #97560
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Enable native AOT for non-portable crossgen2 #97536
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update constant prop to only consider certain hwintrinsics #97616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Work around LLVM issues with null checks #2500
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI produces invalid output for System.Drawing.Common/8.0.0 #38375
  • [ dotnet-8.0.200-rtm.24069.25] dotnet tool install command doesn't show install successful message #38355
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.200] dotnet tool install command get access deny message #38354

Closed

  • [Questions] How to know the latest installed dotnet sdk version on a non sdk style project file like .vcxproj #30289
  • dotnet tool install hangs, then fails #30248
  • dotnet cli does not handle arguments with quotes from PowerShell correctly #29770
  • Issue occurred when running dotnet clean command on console #29641
  • Props file adding implicit usings matching using EndsWith on ProjectName doesn't work when xaml files are added #29307
  • Net 7 -c# 11 Interpolated Strings Object reference not set exception #29373
  • dotnet publish with --no-build broken after dotnet 7 SDK upgrade #29296
  • CLI parsing error in .net 7 handling #29295
  • Commands like `dotnet nuget push --help` do not give help, but forcing an error does #29048
  • Mac OS .NET Incompatible Architecture Need ARM4e #28792
  • (7.0 rc2) dotnet build suddenly stopped working #28777
  • Make classes sealed by default #28610
  • Invalid and unknown locale warnings for package assets should be gated on TFM #28058
  • SSR with .net6 and angular template #27839
  • cli: dotnet --latest #27801
  • Net 7 sdk build freezes computer #27697
  • Passing properties with multiple values stops woring with net7 RC1 - 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 #28131
  • dotnet pack No Longer Correctly Parses Semicolon-Delimited Build Properties Starting in 6.0.301 #27319
  • Prefer to use project templates created in previous .NET versions #27065
  • .net6 Ambiguous reference in rider, but build success. #26522
  • dotnet [packagename] not working #26490
  • Enable FDD + (implicit) RID-specific apps with `RuntimeSpecific` #26031
  • The dotnet publish command using dll timestamp instead of specified version when coping #25776
  • visualstudio code support for Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk #38377
  • mac arm64 vscode unable to find path. Unable to locate the .NET SDK. Check that it is installed and that the version specified in global.json #24753
  • Linux and Mac OSX terminal input is not rendered after `Ctrl+C` is used to terminate `dotnet run` whilst calling `Console.ReadLine` or `Console.ReadKey` or `Console.Read` #24740
  • macOS arm64 vs. x64: improve PEBKAC handling #24737
  • Net472 projects referencing netstandard via a netstandard library not recognized as NETStandard dependent #24559
  • .NET SDK 3.1 replaced the nampespace name with '_" where if ";" used #23916
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publishing blazorwasm project failed with AOT compilation = true with .net9 SDK #37524
  • 'dotnet workload list' CLI command should not download and install workloads without a user permission #38026

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add 8.0.2xx and 8.0.3xx changelog files for containers tooling #38380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unused StringWriter from GenerateToolSettingsFile Task #38378
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Support glob patterns when ignoring baseline TFMs #38374
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Cleanup _DotNetPublishToBlobFeed variable in .vsts-ci.yml #38320
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add 8.0.2xx and 8.0.3xx changelog files for containers tooling #38336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Fix VSTest MSBuild and Terminal Logger integration #38371
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Update to the Jan 8.0.1 released version of the runtime #38344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IP: .NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Include version in deps.json #38087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update for loc #37985
    localization, Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix race in ResetInteractiveWindowFromProjectCommand #71871
  • .NET WinForms: IntelliSense remark IDE0051 shown for own class methods, but not for Form class methods #71870

Closed

  • I`m having problems using Collection Expressions after the latest update of Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3 #71843
  • OpenProjectAsync() is failing in docker container with base image of mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:6.0 #71784
  • Broke API Compatibility #71866

PullRequests

Created

  • Use extensions to make reading/writing streams easier #71882
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sit object reader/writer on top of pipes. #71880
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Write and read uniformly in objectwriter/objectreader #71877
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NewtonsoftJsonVersion problem #71876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove pointless parameter #71875
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fetch all changed projects in a single sync call #71874
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing" #71873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Work on `ctor` snippet after modifiers #71869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add an API to fetch diagnostics with no registered code fix from the CodeFixService #71868
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Prevent setting the vs icon information if it doesn't differ from the kind. #71864
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused functionality #71878
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change WriteEvent calls to WriteEventCore #71785
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Change NRT annotation in SG code #71861
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use raw strings in tests #71834
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config in main after 17.10 P1 snap #71863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #71865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71860
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reorder calls so we don't need to fetch something unchanged. #71859
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Get diagnostic without codefix #71833
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support implicit reference conversions with arrays #71836
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API Proposal: Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery #53715
  • Blazor Server folder publish fails for specific configurations #53714
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53713
  • Combining IdToken and AccessToken Claims To Build Principal In Authorization Code Flow #53712
  • UseStaticFiles, ability to log not found file's path. #53711
  • Handle 3rd party NPM dependencies in source-build #53710
  • Blazor Localization does not work with InteractiveServer #53707
  • Performance Issues with multiple Components rendering in Blazor Web Assembly #53704
  • SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider does not work with FromQueryAttribute #53702
  • Api endpoint does not properly unescape strange string #53701
  • Can't run Authentication Samples #53700
  • [.NET 9] BlazorWebView fails to load on older Android devices `Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token .` #53699
    .NET 9 Planning

Closed

  • HotReload is not working in ASP.NET Core in VS2022 or dotnet watch run when ServiceWorkers are installed/running #39715
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Refused to load `_framework/aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js` due to CSP #33068
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor SSR] Issue with NavigationManager.NavigateTo and Already Percent-Encoded URLs #53708
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #53646
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #53647
  • JwtBearer custom handler (HandleAuthenticateAsync) #53709
  • Blazor Web app mapfallback failing with 401 #53547
  • Remove -internal archives #27686
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [browser][MT] Blazor E2E test with MT runtime #48925
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor] IJSRuntime.InvokeVoidAsync is accessing the wrong DOM in the browser #53677
  • POST request returns error 400 (Bad Request) caused by CORS while fetching in JavaScript #53691
  • Blazor routing in .NET 8 interpreting %2f as / #53668
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #53684
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #53696
  • Blazor 8 issue hot reload (AutoRender / Global) #52706
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-preview1] Package debs with xz compression #53718
    area-infrastructure
  • Package debs with xz compression #53717
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #53716
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Update source index package version #53698
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Return unsuccessful when trying to read form and request does not have body #53680
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-routing
  • [release/8.0] Fix stale values from `[SupplyParameterFromQuery]` #53625
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53500

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When updating MAUI to WinAppSDK 1.4 PInvoke.SetParent no loner works #20253
  • [Windows] ListView and flicker while scrolling #20252
  • AppShell MenuItem doesn't work for Share functionality #20251
  • [Shell][iOS] No way to set search handler ClearPlaceholderIcon color #20250
  • Visual Studio continues to create extra Apple provisioning profile and updates the maui csproj file with it #20248
  • Tap on item in collectionview opens wrong item after multiple taps #20246
    Backlog
  • Migrate legacy UI tests to Appium #20245
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Grid layout breaks in build target='Release' when ColumnDefinitions defined via StaticResource #20244
    Backlog
  • Icons in Shell TabBar and AppBar are no longer updated after changing the UserAppTheme #20243
  • CollectionView not scrolling on MacCatalyst/macOS #20240
    Backlog
  • FontAutoScalingEnabled doesn't work when used in a ListView template #20236

Closed

  • VerticalStackLayout BackgroundColor is ignored #20157
  • Android app crashes when device font size changed by putting app in background. #20239
  • Android Casting in .Net Maui 8 using Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Cast.Framework Does Not work #20233
  • Navigation between top level pages fail in Unpackaged WinUI application #15180
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.49] Deep Link for Android with .Net Maui error - Error when navigate other page #15192
  • Obsolete ImageSource.FromResource #15225
    .NET 9 Planning
  • DeviceInfo not working in iOS #15315
  • Label text with HorizontalOptions="Center" is not centered when breaking onto more than one line #20149
  • iOS app crashes in release mode on physical device #20175

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update with net9.0 #20254
  • Account for margins on sizes returned from Editor #20249
  • Update Layout API Docs #20247
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Reenabled ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBox tests #20238
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • Add Frame observer for UIWindow frame changes #20237
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎

Merged

  • Update VisualElement API Docs #20242
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20158
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Update Template Shell Foreground colour #20152
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    community ✨
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    community ✨, area/keyboard
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-picker
